languages.text: "Я уже говорил, что Эурак-V — священные владения Навис Нобилите, запретная земля для простолюдинов с мирка. Мы надеялись разрешить кризис своими силами, но когда ситуация окончательно вышла из-под контроля, не смогли связаться с миром, ибо предатели повредили оборудование".

traits.locale_text: "Я уже говорил, что Эурак-V — священные владения Навис Нобилите, запретная земля для смердов с захудалой планетки. Мы надеялись разрешить кризис своими силами, но когда ситуация окончательно вышла из-под контроля... не смогли связаться с миром, ибо предатели повредили оборудование".

languages.text: "I have already said Eurac V is sacrosanct. It is the holy domain of the Navis Nobilite, and it is forbidden for commoners from the world below. We had hoped to solve the crisis on our own, but when the situation spiralled out of control, we could not establish contact because the traitors had disabled our equipment."
languages.original_text: "Я уже говорил, что Эурак-V — священные владения Навис Нобилите, запретная земля для простолюдинов с мирка. Мы надеялись разрешить кризис своими силами, но когда ситуация окончательно вышла из-под контроля, не смогли связаться с миром, ибо предатели повредили оборудование".

traits.locale_text: "I already said Eurac-V is sacrosanct, it is the holy domain of Navis Nobilite the commoners from the world below should never tread upon. We had hoped to solve the crisis on our own, but when the situation spiralled out of control we could not contact the world because the traitors had disabled the equipment."

"I already said Eurac-V is sacrosanct, it is the holy domain of Navis Nobilite the commoners from the world below should never tread upon. We had hoped to solve the crisis on our own, but when the situation spiralled out of control we could not contact the world because the traitors had disabled the equipment."

"I have already said Eurac-V is sacrosanct. It is the holy domain of the Navis Nobilite, and it is forbidden for commoners from the world below. We had hoped to solve the crisis on our own, but when the situation spiralled out of control, we could not establish contact because the traitors had disabled our equipment."

"I have already said Eurac V is sacrosanct. It is the holy domain of the Navis Nobilite, and it is forbidden for commoners from the world below. We had hoped to solve the crisis on our own, but when the situation spiralled out of control, we could not establish contact because the traitors had disabled our equipment."

"I have already said Eurac V is sacrosanct. It is the holy domain of the Navis Nobilite, and it is forbidden for commoners from the world below. We had hoped to solve the crisis on our own, but when the situation spiralled out of control, we could not establish contact because the traitors had disabled our equipment."

"I have already said Eurac V is sacrosanct. It is the holy domain of the Navis Nobilite, and it is forbidden for commoners from the world below. We had hoped to solve the crisis on our own, but when the situation spiralled out of control, we could not establish contact because the traitors had disabled our equipment."

languages.text: «Ya he mencionado que Eurac V es sacrosanto. Es el dominio sagrado de la Navis Nobilite, y los plebeyos del mundo inferior tienen prohibida la entrada. Esperábamos resolver la crisis por nuestra cuenta, pero cuando la situación se descontroló, no pudimos ponernos en contacto, pues los traidores habían desactivado nuestros dispositivos».
languages.original_text: "I have already said Eurac V is sacrosanct. It is the holy domain of the Navis Nobilite, and it is forbidden for commoners from the world below. We had hoped to solve the crisis on our own, but when the situation spiralled out of control, we could not establish contact because the traitors had disabled our equipment."

traits.locale_text: «Ya he mencionado que Eurac V es sacrosanto. Es el dominio sagrado de la Navis Nobilite, y los plebeyos del mundo inferior tienen prohibida la entrada. Esperábamos resolver la crisis por nuestra cuenta, pero cuando la situación se descontroló, no pudimos ponernos en contacto, pues los traidores habían desactivado nuestros dispositivos».

languages.text: "Ich habe schon gesagt, dass Eurac V sakrosankt ist. Es ist das heilige Reich der Navis Nobilite, und es ist tabu für das einfache Volk von der Welt darunter. Wir hatten gehofft, die Krise selbst zu lösen, doch als die Situation außer Kontrolle geriet, konnten wir keinen Kontakt aufnehmen, weil die Verräter unsere Ausrüstung sabotiert hatten."
languages.original_text: "I have already said Eurac V is sacrosanct. It is the holy domain of the Navis Nobilite, and it is forbidden for commoners from the world below. We had hoped to solve the crisis on our own, but when the situation spiralled out of control, we could not establish contact because the traitors had disabled our equipment."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe schon gesagt, dass Eurac V sakrosankt ist. Es ist das heilige Reich der Navis Nobilite, und es ist tabu für das einfache Volk von der Welt darunter. Wir hatten gehofft, die Krise selbst zu lösen, doch als die Situation außer Kontrolle geriet, konnten wir keinen Kontakt aufnehmen, weil die Verräter unsere Ausrüstung sabotiert hatten."

languages.text: « Je vous ai déjà expliqué qu'Eurac-V était inviolable. C'est le domaine sacré de la Navis Nobilite, et il est interdit aux petites gens du monde inférieur. Nous espérions sortir de la crise par nos propres moyens, mais lorsque la situation a commencé à nous échapper, nous avons été incapables d'établir le contact : les traîtres avaient désactivé notre matériel. »
languages.original_text: "I have already said Eurac V is sacrosanct. It is the holy domain of the Navis Nobilite, and it is forbidden for commoners from the world below. We had hoped to solve the crisis on our own, but when the situation spiralled out of control, we could not establish contact because the traitors had disabled our equipment."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous ai déjà expliqué qu'Eurac-V était inviolable. C'est le domaine sacré de la Navis Nobilite, et il est interdit aux petites gens du monde inférieur. Nous espérions sortir de la crise par nos propres moyens, mais lorsque la situation a commencé à nous échapper, nous avons été incapables d'établir le contact : les traîtres avaient désactivé notre matériel. »

languages.text: “我之前说过，欧拉克五号星站是神圣不可侵犯之地。这里是导航宗族的圣所，禁止下层世界的平民进入。我们本打算靠我们自己的力量化解这场危机，但当局势慢慢失控之后，我们就无法与外界取得联系了，因为那些叛徒破坏了我们的设备。”
languages.original_text: "I have already said Eurac V is sacrosanct. It is the holy domain of the Navis Nobilite, and it is forbidden for commoners from the world below. We had hoped to solve the crisis on our own, but when the situation spiralled out of control, we could not establish contact because the traitors had disabled our equipment."

traits.locale_text: “我之前说过，欧拉克五号星是神圣不可侵犯之地。这里是导航宗族的圣所，禁止下层世界的平民进入。我们本打算靠我们自己的力量化解这场危机，但当局势慢慢失控之后，我们就无法与外界取得联系了，因为那些叛徒破坏了我们的设备。”

languages.text: 「先ほど言った通り、ユーラック・Vは神聖な場所だ。航宙貴族の聖なる領地であり、下層の一般人の立ち入りは禁じられている。自分たちだけで何とか危機を乗り越えたいとは思っていたが、事態が手に負えなくり、裏切り者が装置を無効化したので、連絡を取ることが出来なかった」
languages.original_text: "I have already said Eurac V is sacrosanct. It is the holy domain of the Navis Nobilite, and it is forbidden for commoners from the world below. We had hoped to solve the crisis on our own, but when the situation spiralled out of control, we could not establish contact because the traitors had disabled our equipment."

traits.locale_text: 「ユーラック・Vは言ったように神聖な場所だ。航宙貴族の聖なる領地であり、下層の一般人の立ち入りは禁止されている。我々の力で危機を乗り越えたいとは思っていたが、事態が制御できなくなり、裏切り者が装置を使えなくしたものだから、連絡を取ることができなかったのだ」
「先ほど言った通り、ユーラック・Vは神聖な場所だ。航宙貴族の聖なる領地であり、下層の一般人の立ち入りは禁じられている。自分たちだけで何とか危機を乗り越えたいとは思っていたが、事態が手に負えなくり、裏切り者が装置を無効化したので、連絡を取ることが出来なかった」

languages.text: "Dedim ya, Eurac V son derece kutsidir. Navis Nobilite'nin kutsal mekânıdır ve aşağı dünyanın avam takımına yasaktır. Başta krizi kendi başımıza çözeriz sandık. İşler çığırından çıktığında da temas kuramadık çünkü hainler, iletişim teçhizatlarını kapatmıştı."
languages.original_text: "I have already said Eurac V is sacrosanct. It is the holy domain of the Navis Nobilite, and it is forbidden for commoners from the world below. We had hoped to solve the crisis on our own, but when the situation spiralled out of control, we could not establish contact because the traitors had disabled our equipment."

traits.locale_text: "Dedim ya, Eurac V son derece kutsidir. Navis Nobilite'nin kutsal mekânıdır ve aşağı dünyanın avam takımına yasaktır. Başta krizi kendi başımıza çözeriz sandık. İşler çığrından çıktığında da temas kuramadık çünkü hainler, iletişim teçhizatlarını kapatmıştı."
